    • Constructor Detail

      • ABRViewController

        public ABRViewController()

    • Method Detail

      • handleInsertClick

        public void handleInsertClick()
        Handles user click on the insert button. Through a dialog asks to the user the key value to insert in the ABR. Validates the input and then modifies the ABR accordingly.

      • handleRemoveClick

        public void handleRemoveClick()
        Handles user click on the remove button. Through a dialog asks to the user the key value to remove from the ABR. Validates the input and then modifies the ABR accordingly.

      • handleSuccessorClick

        public void handleSuccessorClick()
        Handles user click on the successor button. Through a dialog asks to the user the key value of which he wants to know the successor. Validates the input and then invokes the method on the ARB model accordingly.

      • handlePredecessorClick

        public void handlePredecessorClick()
        Handles user click on the predecessor button. Through a dialog asks to the user the key value of which he wants to know the predecessor. Validates the input and then invokes the method on the ARB model accordingly.

      • handleMinClick

        public void handleMinClick()
        Handles user click on the min button. Checks if the tree is null and invokes the min method on the ARB model.

      • handleMaxClick

        public void handleMaxClick()
        Handles user click on the max button. Checks if the tree is null and invokes the max method on the ARB model.

      • handleLookupClick

        public void handleLookupClick()
        Handles user click on the lookup button. Through a dialog asks to the user the key value of the node to look for. Validates the input and then invokes the lookup method on the ARB model accordingly.

      • handleRandomClick

        public void handleRandomClick()
        Handles user click on the random button. Generates 2^MAXH key values. Each values is included between -99 and 99. Inserts the keys in the ABR model and then draws the tree.

      • handleStepClick

        public void handleStepClick()
        Handles user click on the step button. Removes the last element from the steps list. Each step is a 4-uple: [ method name, line number, key of the node to highlight, key of the node to modify graphically ] Highlights the line of pseudocode within the pseudocode view. Possibly draws the updated ARB model. Enables method buttons if the user executes the last step.

      • handleRunClick

        public void handleRunClick()
        Handles user click on the run button. Check which method is currently saved in the steps list. Based on that retrieves the last step of the method execution, gets the key value and highlights the node accordingly.

      • handleClearClick

        public void handleClearClick()
        Handles user click on the clear button. Clears the view and set the model to null.

      • setLessonController

        public void setLessonController(LessonController lessonController)
        Sets lessonController field
        Parameters:
        lessonController - the reference to a LessonController object
